import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Flex, Stack, Text, Container, Box, Accordion, Radio, Group, Center, ColorInput, Slider, Input, Divider, } from "@mantine/core"; import { IconCircleXFilled, IconAlignLeft, IconAlignCenter, IconAlignJustified, IconBold, IconUnderline, IconItalic, IconLetterN, } from "@tabler/icons-react"; const TextTemplate = () => { const [value, setValue] = useState(50); const handleSliderChange = (newValue) => { setValue(newValue); }; const handleInputChange = (e) => { const newValue = e.target.value; setValue(newValue); }; return ( Text
Title Background Color Text Color Size Text Font Text Style Weight Content Padding Content Margin Content Back Button Radious Content {/* */} {/* */} ); }; export default TextTemplate;
